title: Cash Dividend On The Way From Bank of New York Mellon Corp's Series C Noncumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock - Nasdaq.com
text: On 9/4/19, Bank of New York Mellon Corp's Series C Noncumulative Perpetual Preferred Stock (Symbol: BK.PRC) will trade ex-dividend, for its quarterly dividend of $0.325, payable on 9/20/19. As a percentage of BK.PRC's recent share price of $25.84, this dividend works out to approximately 1.26%, so look for shares of BK.PRC to trade 1.26% lower - all else being equal - when BK.PRC shares open for trading on 9/4/19. On an annualized basis, the current yield is approximately 5.06%, which compares to an average yield of 5.51% in the "Financial" preferred stock category, according to  Preferred Stock Channel  .
